text: Eyad Abu Abaid (, ; born December 31, 1994) is an Arab-Israeli footballer who plays for Hapoel Tel Aviv in the Israeli Premier League.Player profile at IFA website Abu Abaid made his debut for Netanya on 12 August 2014 in a Toto Cup game against Maccabi Tel Aviv. Since then he has become a regular in the starting XI. On June 25, 2016 he signed for a three year contract with Maccabi Haifa in which he played 16 matches. On June 8, 2017 Abu Abaid signed a contract for Hapoel Ironi Kiryat Shmona. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli footballers Category:Beitar Nes Tubruk F.C. players Category:Maccabi Netanya F.C. players Category:Hapoel Tel Aviv F.C. players Category:Maccabi Haifa F.C. players Category:Israeli Premier League players Category:Arab-Israeli footballers Category:Arab citizens of Israel Category:Israel under-21 international footballers Category:Association football defenders
title: Eyad Abu Abaid
